title: Ticket #4845: SCHEDD V3 query protcol returns error if there is no projection
description: the schedd V3 query handler does not properly handle the case when there is no projection. In particular this means that a condor_q -long using an 8.3 tool fails to query an 8.2 schedd, because -long doesn't have a projection, but the 8.3 tool 'knows' that the v3 query is supported.
check_ins: 2015-Jan-23 14:12   Check-in [42355]: fix schedd v3 query protocol handler to deal with queries that don't have a projection #4845 ===VersionHistory:Pending=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
